meanings.definition: A distinct period or stage in a process or development.
meanings.sent1: During the planning phase, we gather all the necessary information.
meanings.sent2: The construction phase of the project will begin next week.
meanings.sent3: In the baking competition, the flour phase was particularly messy.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky entered a beautiful pink phase.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar's transformation into a butterfly is a remarkable phase of its life cycle.

meanings.definition: To carry out in gradual stages.
meanings.sent1: We will phase in the new software updates over the next few weeks.
meanings.sent2: It is important to phase the training program to ensure smooth implementation.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to phase their study sessions to avoid last-minute cramming.
meanings.sent4: She phased her workout routine to gradually increase her strength.
meanings.sent5: The company plans to phase out the old machinery and replace it with new equipment.
